author: craigmcc
msg: Implement the proposed changes required to make the commons-dbcp project compile under
either JDK 1.3 or JDK 1.4.  The solution is based on using Ant <replace> tasks to remove
comment statements in a 1.4 environment so that the required extra method calls will be
Submitted by:	Lev Assinovsky <lev at peterlink.ru> and

author: jefft
msg: Convert dbcp and pool's properties to assume the 'dist' build of dependencies,
like beanutils, digester, tomcat etc do. This is so that users can point the
properties at binary distributions, and the paths should still work.
Distribution internal directories are also more stable than temporary build
